text: The South Africa women's cricket team toured New Zealand in 1998–99, playing three women's One Day Internationals. New Zealand whitewashed the series 3-0. ==One Day International series== ===1st ODI=== ===2nd ODI=== ===3rd ODI=== ==Tour matches== ===50-over matches: South Africa women v New Zealand A women=== ==References== Category:1999 in South African cricket Category:1999 in New Zealand cricket Women 1998-99 South Africa 1999 Category:International cricket competitions from 1997–98 to 2000 New Zealand cricket cricket Category:1999 in women's cricket Category:February 1999 sports events in Oceania
title: South African women's cricket team in New Zealand in 1998–99
